channel.title: Fixed it! read to know how stupid I was (fighting error topic)
channel.description:
when I was renaming my server, there where 5 client.java's and I couldn't be assed to change em all, so i copied one changed version and pasted em in all the orthers. Then I got an error in fighting (int,int,int,int for those that remember) and i removed al loopcycle part. Anyways I redownloaded the server and made all the client.java's work good.
LOL

item.title: Fixed it! read to know how stupid I was (fighting error topic)
item.dc:creator: @guthix1pker guthix1pker
item.description:
@guthix1pker wrote:

how to find the line and i didn’t add any npc i just changed all teamtorva to UnholyPK and this happened I didn’t even touch the whole npc thing. it has nothign to do with npc’s it happens if i fight with any npc I will hit but hipoint bars will stay full and no hitsplats will appear. I can fight for a little while then i get this error and it disconnects me.

EDIT: here’s the line

		for(entity.anInt1522++; entity.anInt1521 < animation_1.anInt352 && entity.anInt1522 > animation_1.method258(entity.anInt1521); entity.anInt1521++)//huhhhhh

Read full topic
item.source: Fixed it! read to know how stupid I was (fighting error topic)

item.title: Fixed it! read to know how stupid I was (fighting error topic)
item.dc:creator: @neroxx neroxx
item.description:
@neroxx wrote:

Debug messages?

[size=12pt]TO REMOVE DEBUG MESSAGES[/size]

  1. Go to your Player class
  1. find public boolean debug = true;
    [color=red]3) set it to false

Read full topic
